snippet: With a new feature called Guidebooks, Airbnb aims to keep users from leaving its app by offering neighborhood reviews and recommendations.
abstract: Airbnb begins offering Guidebooks feature, which allows users to share their reviews about their neighborhood's restaurants, stores and other attractions, putting company in competition with review services like Lonely Planet and Yelp.
lead_paragraph: With a new feature called Guidebooks, Airbnb aims to keep users from leaving its app by offering neighborhood reviews and recommendations.

headline.main: Airbnb Wants Travelers to ‘Live Like a Local’ With Its App
headline.print_headline: Airbnb App Offers Guides to Learn the Neighborhood
